description: Folder structure template for organizing media in the archive
archive_root_description: Root directory from user.json - all locations stored under this path

state_type_folder.description: First level: state abbreviation + location type

location_folder.description: Second level: location name + first 8 chars of UUID

photos.description: Image files organized by hardware category

videos.description: Video files organized by hardware category

categorization.file-extensions: Organized by extension (.srt, .xml, etc.) - subfolders created per extension

example_structure.description: Complete example of archive folder structure

template_variables.state: US state abbreviation, lowercase (e.g., ny, vt, pa)
template_variables.type: Location type, lowercase (e.g., industrial, residential, commercial)
template_variables.loc_uuid8: First 8 chars of location UUID, computed from loc_uuid[:8]
template_variables.url_uuid8: First 8 chars of URL UUID, computed from url_uuid[:8]

notes: All folders created by db_folder.py script
Folder structure matches hardware categorization from db_organize.py
Live videos always go to videos/original_other/
Document extensions get subfolders dynamically created as needed
URL folders use full domain to preserve complete information
